## Coverage by Module

The test suite covers the following key modules:

- **core/metric_data.py**: Core data structures and validation
- **core/metric_factory.py**: Factory pattern for metric creation
- **core/metric_compiler.py**: Expression compilation logic
- **evaluation/metric_evaluator.py**: Main evaluation engine
- **evaluation/evaluation_config.py**: Configuration management

## Running Coverage Locally

To generate a coverage report locally:

```bash
# Install test dependencies
pip install pytest pytest-cov

# Run tests with coverage
pytest tests/ --cov=src/polars_eval_metrics --cov-report=html --cov-report=term

# View HTML report
open htmlcov/index.html  # On macOS
# or
xdg-open htmlcov/index.html  # On Linux
```

## Coverage Goals

We aim to maintain:
- **Overall coverage**: > 80%
- **Critical modules**: > 90%
- **New features**: 100% coverage required

## Contributing

When contributing new features or bug fixes:

1. Write tests for all new code
2. Ensure existing tests pass
3. Check coverage doesn't decrease
4. Add integration tests for complex features

## Continuous Integration

Our CI pipeline automatically:
- Runs tests on multiple Python versions (3.11, 3.12)
- Generates coverage reports
- Uploads results to Codecov
- Comments on pull requests with coverage changes

View the latest CI runs on our [GitHub Actions page](https://github.com/elong0527/demo_eval_metric/actions/workflows/test.yml).
